title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\InspectContentRequest
name: InspectContentRequest
description:
Request to search for potentially sensitive info in a ContentItem.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.InspectContentRequest

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: The parent resource name, for example projects/my-project-id.

params.name: data.inspect_config
params.description: Configuration for the inspector. What specified here will override the template referenced by the inspect_template_name argument.

params.name: data.inspect_template_name
params.description: Optional template to use. Any configuration directly specified in inspect_config will override those set in the template. Singular fields that are set in this request will replace their corresponding fields in the template. Repeated fields are appended. Singular sub-messages and groups are recursively merged.
